option.value:
Ahmed Marzougui
  • Home
  • About
  • Skills
  • Projects
  • Experience
  • Education
  • Languages
  • Contact

Ahmed Marzougui

DevOps Engineer | Cloud & Infrastructure Specialist
Contact Me Download CV

About Me

I am a final-year engineering student specializing in IT Infrastructure & Cloud Computing. Passionate about Kubernetes, CI/CD, Terraform, and AWS, I am seeking a 6-month full-time graduation internship in Cloud/DevOps starting December 2025.

Motivated, adaptable, and eager to contribute to cloud-native environments and innovative teams.

Download CV

Skills

Programming

Python
Java
JavaScript
PHP
C/C++
Shell Script
Go

Frameworks / Tools

Spring Boot
Angular
Symfony
.NET
Docker
Kubernetes
Jenkins
MySQL
Nginx

Virtualization / Systems

QEMU/KVM
OCI/Docker Images
Microservices Architecture

Cloud / DevOps

AWS
Terraform
OpenStack
Ansible
Grafana
GitLab
OpenShift
Argo CD
Helm
ELK Stack

Networking

AWS VPC
BGP (GNS3)
Juniper vSRX
Fortinet FortiGate
Firewall
NAT

Projects

Terraform VPC Automation
Developed reusable Terraform modules to automate AWS VPC provisioning, reducing deployment time by 70% and ensuring consistent cloud infrastructure.
View on GitHub
Automated KVM Virtual Lab
Built a virtualization lab using Ansible, libvirt, and Cloud-init to rapidly provision preconfigured VMs for DevOps and testing. Reduced setup time from hours to minutes.
Read Dev.to Article View on GitHub
AWS 3-Tier Architecture
Designed and deployed a highly available, scalable 3-tier AWS architecture with secure network segmentation, autoscaling EC2 instances, and multi-AZ Aurora MySQL database.
View on GitHub
Helm Chart Deployment to EKS with GitLab CI/CD
Step-by-step guide to automating Helm chart deployments to Amazon EKS using GitLab CI/CD. Covers Kubernetes, GitOps, and DevOps automation with practical examples.
Read Medium Guide View GitLab Project
Collaborative File Sharing Platform
Developed a secure, serverless file-sharing platform with:
  • React frontend with AWS Cognito authentication
  • AWS Lambda functions exposed via API Gateway for scalable backend processing
  • Amazon EFS for shared storage and AWS KMS for encryption at rest
  • WAF for edge protection and CloudWatch for observability and logging
Strengthened security posture and ensured scalable, cost-efficient file processing and delivery.
OpenStack Private Cloud & AI Platform
  • Built a private cloud on 7 physical machines using OpenStack, Ansible, and Docker.
  • Developed WorkMate: an AI-powered education platform with smart recommendations, chatbot, and Face-ID portfolios.
  • Implemented hybrid cloud: OpenStack (Kubernetes + MySQL) and AWS (EC2 + S3).
  • Integrated monitoring with Grafana for performance and reliability.

Gained hands-on experience in cloud orchestration, AI integration, and scalable architectures.

Spring Boot on AWS ECS Fargate
  • Automated CI/CD: GitHub triggers CodePipeline for build and deployment.
  • Docker image built with CodeBuild and stored in ECR.
  • CodeDeploy updates ECS Fargate tasks with zero downtime.
  • Auto-scaling managed by ECS Service for high availability.
  • Benefits: Automated, serverless, cost-efficient, scalable, zero downtime.
View on GitHub
CI/CD Pipeline for Node.js on Kubernetes
Developed an automated CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes to deploy a Node.js application. Features code commits, static analysis with SonarQube, containerization, deployment to Kubernetes, monitoring with Prometheus & Grafana, and Slack notifications for fast, reliable, and scalable cloud-native deployments.
CI/CD Pipeline Optimization with Jenkins, Ansible, Docker, GitHub, and AWS
Implemented an automated CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins, GitHub Webhooks, Ansible, and Docker, deployed on AWS EC2. Achieved:
  • 50+ automated builds without manual intervention
  • Deployment in under 5 minutes per commit
  • 30%+ reduction in human errors
  • Real-time monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana with alerting
Improved reliability, speed, and efficiency of deployments for the DevOps team.
Collaborative File Sharing Platform
Developed a secure, serverless file-sharing platform with:
  • React frontend with AWS Cognito authentication
  • AWS Lambda functions exposed via API Gateway for scalable backend processing
  • Amazon EFS for shared storage and AWS KMS for encryption at rest
  • WAF for edge protection and CloudWatch for observability and logging
Strengthened security posture and ensured scalable, cost-efficient file processing and delivery.

Experience

DevSecOps Intern - ST2I, Tunisia (Jun 2025–Sep 2025)
  • Deployed Spring Boot microservices on OpenShift using Helm and RBAC, reducing deployment time by 87% across 3 environments and improving SonarQube security score by 35%.
  • Implemented GitOps with ArgoCD and built a secure CI/CD pipeline integrating GitLab, Trivy, SonarQube, Prometheus, and Grafana, achieving 99.5% uptime and 95% vulnerability detection pre-production.
View Project
DevOps Intern - SOCOOPEC, Tunisia (Jun 2024–Jul 2024)
  • Developed a full-stack web application for internal stock management using Angular and Spring Boot (JWT).
  • Automated front-end delivery with GitHub Actions and deployed it to AWS EC2, reducing manual effort by 80%.
View Project

Education

  • IT Infrastructure and Cloud Technology Engineering - Private Higher School of Engineering and Technologies (2022–Present)
  • Mathematics and Physics Preparatory Cycle - Higher Institute of Applied Sciences and Technology of Mahdia, Tunisia (2019–2022)

Languages

  • French (B2)
  • English (B2)
  • German (A2)
  • Arabic (C2)

Contact

© 2025 Ahmed Marzougui. All rights reserved.
